stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Unstable Shadow Mists Collapsing Cosmic Veils
stories.fantasy_story: The Arch-Wizards of the Celestial Tower have gazed into their scrying pools, revealing strange truths about the Ethereal Shadow Mists. These hidden Mists, unable to touch regular matter, can collide with themselves, causing ancient cosmic veils to dramatically unravel. This startling discovery explains why some celestial realms grow unexpectedly dense and hot.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Artificers Aim for Everyday Magic Use
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Artificers' Guild, led by Master Treasurer Sarah Friar, declared their intent to make their wondrous sentient enchantments accessible to all. The Guild invests vast fortunes into new workshops and mana conduits, striving to bridge the gap between powerful magic and its practical application. Soon, even common folk may wield these amazing artifacts.
